original_text: And he walked in the way of the house of Ahab, and did evil in the sight of the Lord, as did the house of Ahab: for he was the son in law of the house of Ahab.
korean_text: 아하시야가 아합의 집 길로 행하여 아합의 집과 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으니 그는 아합의 집의 사위가 되었음이러라

sentences.original_text: And he walked in the way of the house of Ahab
and did evil in the sight of the Lord
as did the house of Ahab
for he was the son in law of the house of Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 아합 가문의 사위였기 때문이다
